title: People With Certain Medical Conditions And Covid-19 Risk Factors
content:
Smoking - current or former
Itâ€™s never too late to quit smoking. Quitting smoking improves your health, regardless of age or how long you have smoked.
You do not have to quit smoking alone. Find free resources to help you quit and stay quit.
